actions.text: Introduced in House

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Small Business, Oversight and Government Reform, Science, Space, and Technology, Transportation and Infrastructure, Financial Services, House Administration, Natural Resources, Foreign Affairs, Education and the Workforce, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To repeal the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007.
subjects: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

summary.text: Repeals the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 and restores laws amended by such Act.

titles.title: To repeal the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007.
